name: Instagram Influencer Finder with Bright Data (Auto-Filter & Save to Sheets)
description:
Ce flux de travail identifie et qualifie automatiquement les influenceurs Instagram en fonction de vos critères marketing. Il vous fait gagner des heures de recherche manuelle en filtrant automatiquement les profils qui répondent à des exigences spécifiques en matière d'engagement, de nombre de followers et de vérification, puis en stockant les leads qualifiés directement dans Google Sheets.

## Aperçu
Ce flux de travail utilise Bright Data pour extraire les données de profil Instagram, puis applique des filtres intelligents pour identifier des influenceurs ou des comptes de marque de haute qualité. Seuls les profils qui répondent à tous vos critères (statut vérifié, nombre de followers, taux d'engagement et type de compte) sont enregistrés dans votre base de données de leads, gardant votre liste propre et exploitable.

## Outils Utilisés
* **n8n** : La plateforme d'automatisation qui orchestre le flux de travail
* **Bright Data** : Pour extraire les données de profil Instagram sans restrictions
* **Google Sheets** : Pour stocker les leads d'influenceurs qualifiés et les données de profil

## Comment Installer
1. **Importer le Flux de Travail** : Téléchargez le fichier .json et importez-le dans votre instance n8n
2. **Configurer Bright Data** : Ajoutez vos identifiants Bright Data au nœud d'extraction Instagram
3. **Configurer Google Sheets** : Connectez votre compte Google Sheets et copiez le modèle de feuille de calcul
4. **Personnaliser les Filtres** : Ajustez les critères (followers, taux d'engagement, etc.) pour correspondre à vos besoins
5. **Exécuter** : Il vous suffit de coller n'importe quelle URL de profil Instagram et d'exécuter le flux de travail

## Cas d'Utilisation
* **Marketing d'Influence** : Créez une base de données d'influenceurs qualifiés pour des campagnes
* **Partenariats de Marque** : Identifiez des opportunités potentielles de collaboration de marque
* **Analyse de Concurrence** : Suivez les comptes concurrents et leurs métriques d'engagement
* **Génération de Leads** : Trouvez des comptes professionnels dans votre niche pour des démarches B2B
* **Recherche de Marché** : Analysez les types de comptes et les modèles d'engagement dans votre secteur

## Connectez-vous avec Moi
* **Site Web** : https://www.nofluff.online
* **YouTube** : https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
* **LinkedIn** : https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
* **Obtenez Bright Data** : https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25 (Utiliser ce lien soutient mes flux de travail gratuits avec une petite commission)

#n8n #automatisation #marketingd'influence #instagram #brightdata #extractionweb #générationdelead #fluxden8n #fluxdetravail #nocode #marketinginstagram #approcheinfluenceur #stratégiesdesréseauxsociaux #partenariatsdemarque #automatisationmarketing #analytiqueinstagram #base de donnéesd'influenceurs #créateursdecontenu #marketingnumérique #outilsdesréseauxsociaux #rechercheinfluenceur #leadsinstagram #outilsmarketing #identificationd'influenceurs #extractioninstagram #qualificationdesleads #engagementd'influenceur #collaborationdemarque #automatisationinstagram #base de donnéesmarketing

parameters.content:
## 🟩 **Section 1: User Input Setup**

📦 **Nodes Covered:**

1. `🖱 Trigger - Start Manually`
2. `✏️ Set Instagram Profile URL`

---

### 🧩 What happens here?

👆 **Step 1 – Manual Trigger**
This workflow **starts when you manually execute it** in n8n.

> 💡 Useful for testing or running one-off checks.

📝 **Step 2 – Input the Instagram Profile**
The `Set` node lets you **manually enter the Instagram profile URL** you want to check.
You can modify this to take input from:

* A Google Sheet
* A form
* An Airtable base
* Or even a webhook!

---

### 🧠 Why it's important:

This section is where you **feed the system** the Instagram profile you want to analyze. It's like telling a virtual assistant:

> “Hey, here’s a profile. Can you check if it’s worth saving?”

---

## 🟨 **Section 2: Profile Scraping + Smart Filtering**

🔍 **Nodes Covered:**

1. `🔷 Bright Data - Scrape IG Profile`
2. `🔀 Filter - Qualified Profile?`

Copy this spreadsheet:
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1hZFawprfr_a6JC26-0LCQUoz-VuX58A2YxlphQ9Kn_0/edit?usp=sharing
---

### 🧩 What happens here?

📊 **Step 3 – Scrape Instagram Profile with Bright Data**
Using Bright Data’s “Instagram Profiles” tool, n8n sends the profile URL and **retrieves structured data** such as:

* Follower count
* Engagement rate
* Verification status
* Account type (personal vs. professional)

✅ **Step 4 – Apply Business Filters**
An `If` node checks if the profile matches these **four golden criteria**:

* **✔ Verified Account**
* **👥 Follower count > 10,000**
* **💬 Engagement rate > 0.5%**
* **💼 Is a Professional/Business account**

Only profiles that pass **all** these checks continue to the next step.

---

### 🧠 Why it's important:

This section is where the **magic of automation happens**.
You’re using Bright Data to gather real-time Instagram data, and applying **business rules** to **auto-filter valuable profiles**, like:

> “Show me only influencers or brands that are real, active, and potentially useful for marketing.”

---

## 🟦 **Section 3: Smart Output Handling**

📤 **Nodes Covered:**

1. `📄 Save to Google Sheet`
2. `➡️ Skip - Unqualified Profile`

---

### 🧩 What happens here?

🗃 **Step 5 – Save to Google Sheets**
If a profile **passes all checks**, it gets **logged in your lead list spreadsheet** automatically.
Columns could include:

* Username
* Followers
* Engagement rate
* Bio
* Contact info
* Link in bio

🚫 **Step 6 – Do Nothing (If Not Qualified)**
If the profile **fails any filter**, the workflow ends quietly without saving anything.

---

### 🧠 Why it's important:

This final section ensures:

* You **only collect valuable leads**
* Your Google Sheet stays **clean and relevant**
* No need for manual review—everything is **auto-filtered**

> 📈 You now have a **real-time influencer/lead qualification machine**. All you do is enter a profile. n8n + Bright Data handle the rest.

---

=======================================
            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
=======================================

## 🚀 **Instagram Profile Lead Filter Workflow (via Bright Data + n8n)**

### 📌 Goal:

Automatically analyze an Instagram profile and **save it to Google Sheets only if it meets marketing criteria** (e.g. verified, >10K followers, business account, decent engagement).

---

## 🟩 **Section 1: User Input Setup**

📦 **Nodes Covered:**

1. `🖱 Trigger - Start Manually`
2. `✏️ Set Instagram Profile URL`

---

### 🧩 What happens here?

👆 **Step 1 – Manual Trigger**
This workflow **starts when you manually execute it** in n8n.

> 💡 Useful for testing or running one-off checks.

📝 **Step 2 – Input the Instagram Profile**
The `Set` node lets you **manually enter the Instagram profile URL** you want to check.
You can modify this to take input from:

* A Google Sheet
* A form
* An Airtable base
* Or even a webhook!

---

### 🧠 Why it's important:

This section is where you **feed the system** the Instagram profile you want to analyze. It's like telling a virtual assistant:

> “Hey, here’s a profile. Can you check if it’s worth saving?”

---

## 🟨 **Section 2: Profile Scraping + Smart Filtering**

🔍 **Nodes Covered:**

1. `🔷 Bright Data - Scrape IG Profile`
2. `🔀 Filter - Qualified Profile?`

---

### 🧩 What happens here?

📊 **Step 3 – Scrape Instagram Profile with Bright Data**
Using Bright Data’s “Instagram Profiles” tool, n8n sends the profile URL and **retrieves structured data** such as:

* Follower count
* Engagement rate
* Verification status
* Account type (personal vs. professional)

✅ **Step 4 – Apply Business Filters**
An `If` node checks if the profile matches these **four golden criteria**:

* **👥 Follower count > 10,000**
* **💬 Engagement rate > 0.5%**
* **💼 Is a Professional/Business account**

Only profiles that pass **all** these checks continue to the next step.

---

### 🧠 Why it's important:

This section is where the **magic of automation happens**.
You’re using Bright Data to gather real-time Instagram data, and applying **business rules** to **auto-filter valuable profiles**, like:

> “Show me only influencers or brands that are real, active, and potentially useful for marketing.”

---

## 🟦 **Section 3: Smart Output Handling**

📤 **Nodes Covered:**

1. `📄 Save to Google Sheet`
2. `➡️ Skip - Unqualified Profile`

---

### 🧩 What happens here?

🗃 **Step 5 – Save to Google Sheets**
If a profile **passes all checks**, it gets **logged in your lead list spreadsheet** automatically.
Columns could include:

* Username
* Followers
* Engagement rate
* Bio
* Contact info
* Link in bio

🚫 **Step 6 – Do Nothing (If Not Qualified)**
If the profile **fails any filter**, the workflow ends quietly without saving anything.

---

### 🧠 Why it's important:

This final section ensures:

* You **only collect valuable leads**
* Your Google Sheet stays **clean and relevant**
* No need for manual review—everything is **auto-filtered**

> 📈 You now have a **real-time influencer/lead qualification machine**. All you do is enter a profile. n8n + Bright Data handle the rest.

---

## 🌟 **Benefits of This Automation**

✅ Saves **hours of manual checking**
✅ Perfect for **influencer marketing, outreach, or brand research**
✅ Easy to upgrade (loop through a list, add enrichment, auto-email, etc.)
✅ Beginner-friendly but **professional-grade automation**

---

## I’ll receive a tiny commission if you join Bright Data through this link—thanks for fueling more free content!

### https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
